Class StudentList

Object
ListManager<Student>
StudentList
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreamManager
public class StudentList extends ListManager<Student>
A collection object for holding and managing Students.

      public Student get(String key) throws IllegalStateException
      Finds an item by a key (e.g., ID).
      Specified by:

      key - the text used to identify the item
      Returns:
      the item if found
      Throws:

    • byLui

      public Student byLui(Long lui) throws IllegalStateException
      Get the Student with a matching LUI.
      Parameters:
      lui - - the LUI of the Student to be found.
      Returns:
      Student with a matching LUI, if it exists.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - throw an IllegalStateException if it can't find a matching student as that indicates there is a misalignment of the executing state and the complete list of possible items.

    • countStudents

      public int countStudents(Subject subject, boolean aara)
      Counts the number of either non-AARA or AARA students taking a particular Subject.
      Parameters:
      subject - the subject to be found.
      aara - true to count AARA students or false to count non-AARA students.
      Returns:
      The number of either non-AARA or AARA students taking a particular subject.
